lines: OUR SAVIOUR LIKE A SHEPHERD LEAD US
Hi Hlayise U Hi Yisa Madyelweni Yo Xonga, U Nkateko Eka Hina, Yesu, U Hi Xavile,
Hi Ngati Xihambanweni, Yesu, U Hi Xavile.
2.Hi Va Wena Nakulorhi, Hi Letele Ndleleni, Hi Vhikele Swidyohweni, Hi Nga Lahleki
U Nkateko Wena Yesu, Yingisa Swikhongelo,
Loko Hi Rila Yesu, Yingisa Swikhongelo.
3.U Tshembhise Kâ€™amukela, Hambi Hi Ri Vadyohi;
Hi Nsovo U Ta Hi Ntshuxa, U Hi Endla Vo Tenga;
U Nkateko Hosi Yesu, Hi Ta Tshama Ka Wena.
